The §6easing function§r used for the fade animation

Whether or not the backgrounds of §6every other message §ris colored differently to create a §6striped§r effect

The §6maximum§r amount of lines stored in the §9Chat HUD§r

advancedchat.config.chatsuggestor.info.s:
Whether or not §6shortcuts§r are suggested as you type
Shortcuts are a way to bind a memorable phrase to a string of text, such as for emoticons
To use shortcuts, put a §6colon (§f:§6)§r and the shortcut name, and press §6tab

Whether or not the §6chat calculator§r is active
To use the chat calculator, put a §6math expression§r inside of §6[§fBrackets§6]§r, and press §6tab
Expressions follow the format of §6mXParser

Whether or not the §6namespace§r should be omitted from the §dChat Suggestor§r
The namespace is the part of the ID that §6preceeds§r the colon and 
includes the colon, such as '§6minecraft:§r' in minecraft:stone

advancedchat.config.chatsuggestor.info.a: What color §6custom chat suggestors§r will show up as

What the tab shows up as §6in the config 
§7§oIt is good practice to name your tabs meaningfully!
advancedchat.config.tab.info.startingmes: What text shows up §6when the tab is focused§r

advancedchat.config.tab.info.forward: Whether or not messages sent to this chat tab also show up in the §6main chat tab§r
advancedchat.config.tab.info.findstring: The string that will be §6searached§r and §6diverted to this tab§r
advancedchat.config.tab.info.findtype:
How matches will be found
§6Literal §r- Matches §6exactly §rthe string
§eUpper-Lower §r- Like §6Literal, §rbut not §6case-sensitive
§bRegEx §r - Parses the string as a §6regular expression
§dAll §r- Passes §6all §rtext through to the tab, regardless of the string to find

advancedchat.config.tab.info.innercolor: The color of the §6background§r of the §bchat tab
advancedchat.config.tab.info.showunread: Whether or not the number of §6unread messages§r are displayed for the §bchat tab§r
advancedchat.config.filter.name: Filter Name
advancedchat.config.filter.info.name:
What the filter shows up as §6in the config§r
 §7§bIt is good practice to name your filters meaningfully!
advancedchat.config.filter.info.findstri: The string that will be §6searached§r and §6filtered§r
advancedchat.config.filter.info.findtype:
How matches will be found
§6Literal §r- Matches §6exactly §rthe string
§eUpper-Lower §r- Like §6Literal, §rbut not §6case-sensitive
§bRegEx §r - Parses the string as a §6regular expression
§dAll §r- Passes §6all §rtext through the filter, regardless of the string to find. This option is mainly used if you want to use a parent filter soley for grouping several child filters
advancedchat.config.filter.info.replacet:
The string that §6replaces §rwhat is set for §6replace type §r
§b%MATCH%§r is replaced by whatever §6triggered§r the filter

How the filter should replace the matched message 
§cNone §r - Replaces §6nothing
§dChildren §r- Passes the §6matched string§r to be modified by §6child filters
§aFull Message §r- Replaces the full message with the §6replace to§r string
§eOnly Match §r- Replaces only what §6triggered §rthe filter
§6OwO§r - Sends §6the entire message§r to be converted to OwO (furry) speak
§9Rainbow§r - Converts the §6entire message§r to §cr§6a§ei§an§9b§1o§5w
§bRoman Numeral§r - Parses any §6numbers§r and converts them to §broman numerals
§5Reverse§r - §5Reverses§r the §6entire message§r
